meanings.definition: Traveling from place to place, especially on foot.
meanings.sent1: Her peregrinations adventures took her through forests and mountains.
meanings.sent2: The peregrinations hiker explored the entire national park.
meanings.sent3: The peregrinations explorer always had a new blister to show off.
meanings.sent4: His peregrinations journey led him to unexpected discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The peregrinations traveler's worn-out shoes told stories of distant lands.

meanings.definition: A journey or series of travels.
meanings.sent1: Their peregrinations around the world lasted for years.
meanings.sent2: The peregrinations of the ancient nomads were well-documented.
meanings.sent3: The peregrinations of the lost tourist amused the locals.
meanings.sent4: In the peregrinations of life, we often find ourselves in unexpected places.
meanings.sent5: The peregrinations of the migrating birds painted the sky with beauty.
